title: PS3 Game Collecting :: Launch Titles :: Tips & Advice :: Part 2

media:group.media:title: PS3 Game Collecting :: Launch Titles :: Tips & Advice :: Part 2
media:group.media:description:
I continue my PS3 coverage: What I have learned collecting PS3 games over the years, what pitfalls to avoid, how to cope with the unpredictable hurdles collecting will put in front of you. 
PART 2:
We take a look at the 2006 exclusive launch titles and I talk more general collecting advice: What do I use to keep track of my collection and how do I research game prices?

INFO & LINKS
----------------------
Launch dates:
November 11, 2006, in Japan; November 17, 2006, in North America; March 23, 2007, in Europe and Australia/NZ.
There were not many true exclusives!

Kaz Hirai, President, and CEO of Sony Computer Entertainment America: â€œWe are pioneering a new era of true next-generation gaming through such titles as Resistance: Fall of Man, a visually arresting game that takes advantage of the large storage capacity and exceptional visual clarity offered by Blu-ray Disc (BD)."

PS3 *Exclusive* Launch Titles November 2006
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Mobile Suit Gundam: Crossfire (PS3- Mobile Suit Gundam Target in Sight)
Ridge Racer 7
MotorStorm (March 2007 in NA and EU)
Genji: Days of the Blade
Resistance: Fall of Man
Untold Legends: Dark Kingdom
